languages.text: "Не смею оспаривать опыт и проницательность господина Сенешаля — его воспитанники действительно достигают многого и показывают себя безупречно. Но подобное покровительство через голову их непосредственного начальника растит в ваших слугах непочтительность к иерархии. Сегодня блюститель идет к Сенешалю, чтобы оспорить приказ Мастера дисциплины, завтра — идет к Лорд-капитану, чтобы оспорить приказ Сенешаля. Я вижу в данных поступках преемственность".

"I cannot deny Master Werserian's experience and insight — the Seneschal has a record of fostering students who have indeed achieved much and demonstrated impeccable performance. However, extending such patronage over the head of their immediate superior encourages disregard for hierarchy among Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s servants. Today, an enforcer goes to the Seneschal to report an order from the Master-at-Arms that they happen to disagree with. Tomorrow, they will go to the Lord Captain to object to the Seneschal's order. I notice a pattern in these actions."
languages.original_text: "Не смею оспаривать опыт и проницательность господина Сенешаля — его воспитанники действительно достигают многого и показывают себя безупречно. Но подобное покровительство через голову их непосредственного начальника растит в ваших слугах непочтительность к иерархии. Сегодня блюститель идет к Сенешалю, чтобы оспорить приказ Мастера дисциплины, завтра — идет к Лорд-капитану, чтобы оспорить приказ Сенешаля. Я вижу в данных поступках преемственность".

traits.locale_text: "I cannot deny Master Werserian's experience and insight — the Seneschal has a record of students who have indeed achieved much and demonstrated impeccable performance. However, extending such patronage over the head of their immediate superior fosters disregard for hierarchy among Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s servants. Today, an enforcer goes to the Seneschal to report the Master-at-Arms's order they happen to disagree with. Tomorrow, they will go to the Lord Captain to object to the Seneschal's order. I notice a pattern in those actions."

languages.text: "Meister Werserians Erfahrung und Einblick steht außer Frage ... der Truchsess hat schon viele Schüler gefördert, die in der Tat viel erreicht und mit erstaunlichen Leistungen überzeugt haben. Allerdings fördert die Ausweitung einer solchen Unterstützung über den Kopf des unmittelbaren Vorgesetzten hinweg die Missachtung der Hierarchie in den Reihen der Untertanen Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Heute geht ein Enforcer zum Truchsess, um ihm einen Befehl der Waffenmeisterin zu melden, der ihm aus irgendeinem Grund missfällt. Morgen geht er dann zum Lord Captain, um sich dem Befehl des Truchsess zu widersetzen. Ich erkenne darin ein Muster."
languages.original_text: "I cannot deny Master Werserian's experience and insight — the Seneschal has a record of fostering students who have indeed achieved much and demonstrated impeccable performance. However, extending such patronage over the head of their immediate superior encourages disregard for hierarchy among Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s servants. Today, an enforcer goes to the Seneschal to report an order from the Master-at-Arms that they happen to disagree with. Tomorrow, they will go to the Lord Captain to object to the Seneschal's order. I notice a pattern in these actions."

traits.locale_text: "Meister Werserians Erfahrung und Einblick steht außer Frage ... der Truchsess hat schon viele Schüler gefördert, die in der Tat viel erreicht und mit erstaunlichen Leistungen überzeugt haben. Allerdings fördert die Ausweitung einer solchen Unterstützung über den Kopf des unmittelbaren Vorgesetzten hinweg die Missachtung der Hierarchie in den Reihen der Untertanen Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Heute geht ein Enforcer zum Truchsess, um ihm einen Befehl der Waffenmeisterin zu melden, der ihm aus irgendeinem Grund missfällt. Morgen geht er dann zum Lord Captain, um sich dem Befehl des Truchsess zu widersetzen. Ich erkenne darin ein Muster."

languages.text: « Je ne nie pas l'expérience et la sagesse de maître Werserian, le sénéchal a pris sous son aile maints étudiants brillants dont les états de service se sont par la suite révélés irréprochables. Cependant, le fait qu'il soit passé outre l'autorité de leur supérieur immédiat encourage un certain mépris pour la hiérarchie qui régit le vaisseau, Votre Seigneurie. Si aujourd'hui, un prévôt peut se permettre de se plaindre auprès du sénéchal d'un ordre reçu de la capitaine d'armes, dès demain, c'est vous qu'il viendra voir pour dénoncer les instructions dudit sénéchal. La vérité, c'est que rien n'arrive par hasard. »
languages.original_text: "I cannot deny Master Werserian's experience and insight — the Seneschal has a record of fostering students who have indeed achieved much and demonstrated impeccable performance. However, extending such patronage over the head of their immediate superior encourages disregard for hierarchy among Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s servants. Today, an enforcer goes to the Seneschal to report an order from the Master-at-Arms that they happen to disagree with. Tomorrow, they will go to the Lord Captain to object to the Seneschal's order. I notice a pattern in these actions."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne nie pas l'expérience et la sagesse de maître Werserian, le sénéchal a pris sous son aile maints étudiants brillants dont les états de service se sont par la suite révélés irréprochables. Cependant, le fait qu'il soit passé outre l'autorité de leur supérieur immédiat encourage un certain mépris pour la hiérarchie qui régit le vaisseau, Votre Seigneurie. Si aujourd'hui, un prévôt peut se permettre de se plaindre auprès du sénéchal d'un ordre reçu de la capitaine d'armes, dès demain, c'est vous qu'il viendra voir pour dénoncer les instructions dudit sénéchal. La vérité, c'est que rien n'arrive par hasard. »

languages.text: «No negaré la experiencia y sagacidad de maese Werserian; el senescal ha amparado a muchos estudiantes que sin duda han llegado muy lejos y han demostrado un rendimiento impecable. No obstante, ofrecer esa tutela pasando por encima de su superior inmediato fomenta una falta de respeto hacia la jerarquía entre sus siervos, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Hoy un guardia acude al senescal para informar de una orden de la maestra de armas con la que no está de acuerdo; mañana, quizá acuda {mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán para protestar por una orden del senescal. Veo un patrón en esta conducta».
languages.original_text: "I cannot deny Master Werserian's experience and insight — the Seneschal has a record of fostering students who have indeed achieved much and demonstrated impeccable performance. However, extending such patronage over the head of their immediate superior encourages disregard for hierarchy among Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s servants. Today, an enforcer goes to the Seneschal to report an order from the Master-at-Arms that they happen to disagree with. Tomorrow, they will go to the Lord Captain to object to the Seneschal's order. I notice a pattern in these actions."

traits.locale_text: «No negaré la experiencia y sagacidad de maese Werserian; el senescal ha amparado a muchos estudiantes que sin duda han llegado muy lejos y han demostrado un rendimiento impecable. No obstante, ofrecer esa tutela pasando por encima de su superior inmediato fomenta una falta de respeto hacia la jerarquía entre sus siervos, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Hoy un guardia acude al senescal para informar de una orden de la maestra de armas con la que no está de acuerdo; mañana, quizá acuda {mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán para protestar por una orden del senescal. Veo un patrón en esta conducta».

languages.text: 「マスター・ウェルザリアンの経験や洞察力を否定することはできません。家令長には、実に多くのことを成し遂げ、非の打ちどころのないパフォーマンスを発揮する生徒たちを育ててきた実績があります。ですが、直属の上司の頭越しにそのような庇護を受けていては、陛下の従者間の上下関係が無視されることにつながるでしょう。今日、あるエンフォーサーが家令長のもとに赴き、たまたま彼らが不服とするマスター・アット・アームからの命令について報告する。明日になれば、彼らは家令長の命令に異議を唱えるべく、ロード・キャプテンのもとに行くことでしょう。こういった行動にはパターンがあるのです」
languages.original_text: "I cannot deny Master Werserian's experience and insight — the Seneschal has a record of fostering students who have indeed achieved much and demonstrated impeccable performance. However, extending such patronage over the head of their immediate superior encourages disregard for hierarchy among Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s servants. Today, an enforcer goes to the Seneschal to report an order from the Master-at-Arms that they happen to disagree with. Tomorrow, they will go to the Lord Captain to object to the Seneschal's order. I notice a pattern in these actions."

traits.locale_text: 「マスター・ウェルザリアンの経験や洞察力を否定することはできません。家令長には、実に多くのことを成し遂げ、非の打ちどころのないパフォーマンスを発揮する生徒たちを育ててきた実績があります。ですが、直属の上司の頭越しにそのような庇護を受けていては、陛下の従者間の上下関係が無視されることにつながるでしょう。今日、あるエンフォーサーが家令長のもとに赴き、たまたま彼らが不服とするマスター・アット・アームからの命令について報告する。明日になれば、彼らは家令長の命令に異議を唱えるべく、ロード・キャプテンのもとに行くことでしょう。こういった行動にはパターンがあるのです」

languages.text: “我无法否认韦尔森大师的经验与洞见。事实上，韦尔森总领亲自培养出的学生确实取得了出色的成就，他们的表现也都无可挑剔。然而，总领对这些人的偏袒，有时会凌驾于这些人的直属上级之上，这会鼓励您的仆人漠视船上的等级制度。今天是执法者直接跑到总领这里告状，对戒律大师颁布的命令表示不满，到了明天，他们就会直接跑到舰长大人面前，反对总领下达的命令。我已经注意到了，这样的行为都是有规律的。”
languages.original_text: "I cannot deny Master Werserian's experience and insight — the Seneschal has a record of fostering students who have indeed achieved much and demonstrated impeccable performance. However, extending such patronage over the head of their immediate superior encourages disregard for hierarchy among Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s servants. Today, an enforcer goes to the Seneschal to report an order from the Master-at-Arms that they happen to disagree with. Tomorrow, they will go to the Lord Captain to object to the Seneschal's order. I notice a pattern in these actions."

traits.locale_text: “我无法否认韦尔森大师的经验与洞见。事实上，韦尔森总领亲自培养出的学生确实取得了出色的成就，他们的表现也都无可挑剔。然而，总领对这些人的偏袒，有时会凌驾于这些人的直属上级之上，这会鼓励您的仆人漠视船上的等级制度。今天是执法者直接跑到总领这里告状，对戒律大师颁布的命令表示不满，到了明天，他们就会直接跑到舰长大人面前，反对总领下达的命令。我已经注意到了，这样的行为都是有规律的。”

languages.text: "Üstat Werserian'ın tecrübesi ile içgörüsünü inkâr edemem. Seneşal'in gerçekten de büyük başarılara imza atmış ve kusursuz performanslar sergilemiş öğrencileri himayesine aldığı bilinir. Ancak böylesi bir hami rolünün üstlerine varacak denli yayılması, {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin hizmetkârlarını hiyerarşiyi hiçe saymaya teşvik edecektir. Bir infazcı bugün gider, Seneşal'e Silahtar'ın bir emriyle hemfikir olmadığını bildirir. Yarın gider, Lord Kaptan'a Seneşal'in bir emrine itiraz ettiğini bildirir. Bu tür eylemlerde bir düzen olduğunu görebiliyorum."
languages.original_text: "I cannot deny Master Werserian's experience and insight — the Seneschal has a record of fostering students who have indeed achieved much and demonstrated impeccable performance. However, extending such patronage over the head of their immediate superior encourages disregard for hierarchy among Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s servants. Today, an enforcer goes to the Seneschal to report an order from the Master-at-Arms that they happen to disagree with. Tomorrow, they will go to the Lord Captain to object to the Seneschal's order. I notice a pattern in these actions."
